channel.title: CVE Feed for Objectplanet -- Opinio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Objectplanet -- Opinio

item.title: CVE-2023-4472|2024-08-02T07:31:05.503Z -- objectplanet -- opinio
item.description: Objectplanet Opinio version 7.22 and prior uses a cryptographically weak pseudo-random number generator (PRNG) coupled to a predictable seed, which could lead to an unauthenticated account takeover of any user on the application.
